jhelp.gui.twoD

Class JHelpDialog2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.twoD.JHelpDialog2D

  • public class JHelpDialog2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Dialog 2D.
    Dialog are created by JHelpFrame2D.createDialog(JHelpComponent2D).
    By default, click outside the dialog, close it, you can avoid this behavior with setClikOutClose(boolean), but in this case don't forget to add an other way to close it
    Author:
    JHelp
